comments.author: Dave
comments.body: My back still feels like the cute little critter from Alien has sunk its teeth in... I'm going to take the day off and hope for the best tomorrow.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I walked for a hour. A nice change from running, in fact. Decided to check out that big glass box they're building at the base of Flagstaff. Yup, it's a house. Holy cow. I should be back in fightin' trim for tomorrow's FF.
